concept.title: 205.301 General.

conbody.p: (a)(S-70) Synopsis of exceptions to domestic source requirements.

(i) In accordance with 10 U.S.C. 2533a(k), contracting officers also must synopsize through the GPE, awards exceeding the simplified acquisition threshold that are for the acquisition of any clothing, fiber, yarn, or fabric items described in 225.003 (10).‚Äù
